info.name: myLearning Dark Mode
info.description:
A Stylus extension to give Canvas/myLearning a dark mode so your retinas don't have to burn out. Made for the WRHS Canvas/myLearning, but should work on other versions of this software. 

*For the most up to date code and news, please visit the Github repository at: https://github.com/SoupyzInc/CanvasDarkMode
